articles.content: Coronavirus symptoms may include skin problems, such as rashes and so-called "COVID toes," experts believe. One small study in Italy found 20 percent of COVID-19 patients had skin problems, while anecdotal evidence from other countries indicates a link betwee… [+6517 chars]

articles.author: Alex Chapman
articles.title: Coles store in Lithgow undergoes deep cleaning after employee tests positive for coronavirus - 7NEWS.com.au
articles.description: The store is in an area the state government has identified as a hotspot for community transmission.
articles.content:
A Coles store in the Blue Mountains has undergone deep cleaning after an employee tested positive for coronavirus.
The supermarket in Lithgow was closed at the end of last week as NSW Health conducted contact tracing.

articles.title: Coronavirus Australia: SA records five consecutive days without COVID-19 cases - 7NEWS.com.au
articles.description: South Australia has become the first state to record five consecutive days without new coronavirus cases.
articles.content:
South Australia has recorded its fifth consecutive day with zero new coronavirus cases, a milestone not seen since the outbreak began.
The states total number of cases remains at 438.
